title: Autobiography and personal recollections of John B. Gough,
author: Gough, John B.
snippet: We visited Perth on the 10th, Aberdeen the 14th, 15th, and 19th; then by Stranraer, Wigton, and Castle  Douglas, to Waterbeck, that being the last place in Scotland where I spoke, excepting the farewell speech and soiree in Glasgow, February 21, and 22, 1860, and from there, direct, to London.
